pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Sonic Robo Blast 2 Kart is a community developed kart racing mod for "Sonic Robo Blast 2", a 3D Sonic The Hedgehog fangame based on Doom Legacy.
For more information about "Sonic Robo Blast 2", visit https://srb2.org/
I hope you're happy now.
